content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: emerald_block
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 10}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 60, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 52, "index": 12}, {"type": "emerald", "quantity": 9, "index": 14}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 64, "index": 15}, {"type": "cyan_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 20}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 22}, {"type": "polished_granite_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "painting", "quantity": 47, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 20, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft an emerald_block, I need to place 9 emeralds in a 3x3 square in the crafting grid. I will start by placing one of the emeralds from slot 14 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
